name: Oh beloved, Let me in
description:
Find your bandmates and woo the princess, go back and find better bandmates if she says no...

A Nordic Game Jam 2022 game by Horatiu Roman & Lars Bindslev

Special thanks to Andreas Lagerstedt for the backing vocals!

Composition by Horatiu Roman and Milan Grajetzki, lyrics created as a collaboration between Horatiu Roman, Milan Grajetzki and OpenAI disguised as aidungeon.io!

Forest ambience by https://freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/

Town ambience by https://freesound.org/people/ramonmineiro/
